widget.name: Google Maps Route Planner
widget.description: An extension to the default Mendix Maps widget for showing point locations on a Google Map. It offers heaps of extra features like dropping/dragging and clustering

property.caption: Height
property.description: The map's height in pixels. Setting it to 10.000 will set it to 100 of the view height and resize it dynamically when zooming.

property.caption: Width
property.description: The map's width in pixels. Setting it to 10.000 will set it to 100 % of the width of the screen and will resize it dynamically when zooming.

property.caption: Maps API Access Key
property.description: For using in Production, a Google Maps API key will be needed. For development purposes it can be left empty, but will generate text overlays 'For development purposes only' by Google

property.caption: Default Latitude
property.description: Default latitude for the map to start at.

property.caption: Default Longitude
property.description: Default longitude for the map to start at.

property.caption: Map Type
property.description: Set the default map type

property.caption: Zoom to Current Location
property.description: When set to 'Yes' the browser will try to get the current location. If succesfull that loction will be used to zoom. In case an object can be drawn, the marker will already be placed at the current location.

property.caption: Travel Mode Attribute
property.description: Defines the Travel mode

property.caption: Fix Departure/Arrival
property.description: Whether to fix the Departure or Arrival DateTime

property.caption: Address From
property.description: The address to start from. Only used if latitude and longitude are empty. Will then be set after determining route based on geocoding of lat and long.

property.caption: Waypoints Array String
property.description: Optionally add pipeline delimited waypoints to the route. Not applicable for TRANSIT mode.

property.caption: Latitude From
property.description: The latitude to start from. Is set together with longitude, this will overrule the Address From field and trigger setting the Address From based on geocoding of lat and long.

property.caption: Longitude From
property.description: The longitude to start from

property.caption: Address To
property.description: The address to go to

property.caption: Arrival Time
property.description: The required arrival time attribute If arrival time is set, departure time will not be used and actually set, based on arrival time - duration.

property.caption: Departure Time
property.description: The required departure time attribute.

property.caption: Avoid Highways
property.description: Specify whether highways should be avoided or not when determining the best route.

property.caption: Avoid Ferries
property.description: Specify whether ferries should be avoided or not when determining the best route.

property.caption: Avoid Tolls
property.description: Specify whether tolls should be avoided or not when determining the best route.

property.caption: Provide Route Alternatives
property.description: Specify whether Google should provide Route alternatives as well.

property.caption: Draggable
property.description: Determine whether the markers on the route are draggable.

property.caption: Duration
property.description: The duration for the selected route will be set in this attribute.

property.caption: Distance
property.description: The distance for the selected route will be set in this attribute.

property.caption: InfoWindow widget
property.description: This widget will be shown in the marker info bubble. (Not required)

property.caption: Disable infowindow on click
property.description: When set to true the on click microflow will directly be triggered in stead of via the infowindow.

property.caption: When infowindow itself is disabled, this on click action, if configured, will be called directly
Enabled
property.description: Enable/Disable search box. Be aware; this functionality needs a working API key, also to test.

property.caption: Placeholder
property.description: Add a placeholder text to the search box input area.

property.caption: Width
property.description: Determine the width in pixels for the SearchBox.

property.caption: Width
property.description: Determine the height in pixels for the SearchBox.

property.caption: Drag
property.description: Enable/disable dragging a map using the mouse

property.caption: Type
property.description: Enable/disable Map Type control

property.caption: Scroll
property.description: Enable/disable using the scrollwheel to zoom in/out

property.caption: Streetview
property.description: Enable/disable Streetview control

property.caption: Zoom Control
property.description: Enable/disable Zoom control

property.caption: Tilt
property.description: Angle of the map. This can be set to 45 degrees, if this is available for some locations and only when using type Satellite or Hybrid. It will automatically switch to 0 degrees if it is not available.

property.caption: Style Array
property.description: Use this to add custom styles to your maps.
